slides.title: Indian History
slides.content:
**Ancient:** Indus Valley, Vedic, Maurya, Gupta
**Medieval:** Delhi Sultanate, Mughal Empire
**Modern:** British Rule, Freedom Struggle, Independence 1947

slides.title: World History
slides.content:
**World Wars:** WWI (1914-18), WWII (1939-45)
**Cold War:** USA vs USSR (1947-91)
**UN:** Formed 1945 for world peace
